thread.section_title: Hilton Garden Inn New York/Central Park South-Midtown West - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Impressed
thread.title_full: Impressed - Review of Hilton Garden Inn New York/Central Park South-Midtown West, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: WeIITraveIed
title: Impressed
text:
We stayed here for business as our meeting was about a block away. I was impressed with the quality of accommodations and service at this Hilton Garden Inn. This facility is freshly renovated and size and finish-out of the rooms is great for NY.
Location is also great for this part of the city.
Room Tip: my room was literally in between two elevators so don't ask me See more room tips
